Project 2

Proposal

Author

Omar Youssif

Proposal

In this project, the goal is to create some interesting and interactive visualizations for analysis of international air travel in the United States.

Dataset

Monthly data about international air travel in all of the United States from 1990 to 2023:

Rows: 766,693
Columns: 16
$ data_dte     <chr> "07/01/2004", "11/01/2008", "10/01/2002", "03/01/2007", "…

The data used for this project will have 766,693 rows and 16 columns.
